caption: Relating to the applicability of sex offender registration requirements to the offense of improper relationship between educator and student.
undersanding:
Summary (under 80 words):
This bill amends the Code of Criminal Procedure to include "improper relationship between educator and student" as a reportable conviction requiring sex offender registration. This applies to all educators and students regardless of nationality, including Chinese educators or students in Texas. The law affects anyone convicted of this offense, making it a requirement to register as a sex offender.

中文翻译：
该法案修改《刑事诉讼法》，将"教育工作者与学生之间的不当关系"列为需要进行性犯罪者登记的应报告定罪之一。这适用于所有教育工作者和学生，包括在德克萨斯州的中国教育工作者或学生。被判定犯有此罪的人都必须进行性犯罪者登记。

Most likely committees:
1. Criminal Justice Committee
